pkgmetadata.longdescription: Contents--------The ``batchx`` package contains the ``bx`` main application module, thatoffers full access to the BatchX gRPC API from Python code.How to use----------.. code:: python # Import the module from batchx import bx # Connect to the BatchX servers # (environment variables `BATCHX_ENDPOINT` and `BATCHX_TOKEN` expected) bx.connect() # Instantiate service class org_service = bx.OrganizationService() # Create data request request = org_service.GetOrganizationRequest(organization="batchx") # Call the RPC response = org_service.GetOrganization(request); print(response)See also--------- BatchX documentation: https://docs.batchx.io- Python protobuf messages: https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/reference/python-generated
